chapters.title: Prologue: In the Shadow
chapters.info: Ba'alzamon, p. xxi (xix)—Name assumed by Ishamael (one of the Forsaken) and used by Trollocs, Myrddraal, and Darkfriends when he calls them together. The name means “Heart of the Dark,” and is believed by the rest of the world to be the Trolloc name for the Dark One. Ba'alzamon does nothing to keep his followers from believing he is the Dark One.
